subject: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
Abidjan,-Cote D Ivoire.
 
 Dear 
Is my pleasure to contact you for a business venture which I and my Son,intend to establish in your country.
 
Though I have not met with you before but I believe, one has to risk confiding in someone to succeed sometimes in life. There is this amount of Twelve Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only (USD$12.5M) which my late Husband deposited with a security company in Abidjan Capital city of Cote d Ivoire which he wanted to use for his political ambition in our Country before he was assassinated.
 
Now I and my son have decided to invest this money in your country or anywhere safe enough outside here for security and political reasons.We want you to help us reclaim and receive the consignment in your name from the security company's affiliate outside Cote d'Ivoire through diplomatic means or you come down here in Cote d'Ivoire for us to visit the security company together for the claim in your name to avoid any traces of the funds and to enable you plan for the investment in your Country.
 
 I have plans to invest part of the money into these three investment in your Country but,if there is any other business that is better than what I have suggested, I will be very glad to follow your advice .
 
1). Real estate
2). The transport industry
3). Five star hotel.
 
We hope to offer you 25% Of the total fund for your assistance to us while the balance will be invested on our behalf by you . I await your soonest response.
Respectfully yours,
 Mrs.Janet Ayew

subject: Re:    From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Hello Ayew,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this business proposal. It sounds like a significant opportunity, and I'm intrigued by the potential of investing in real estate, the transport industry, and a five-star hotel.

I have a few questions that I hope you can help clarify for me. Firstly, could you provide more details about the security company holding the funds? Also, how would we go about reclaiming and receiving these funds?

Secondly, regarding the investment plans - do you have any specific locations or types of properties in mind for the real estate investment? As for the transport industry and five-star hotel, are there any particular markets or regions you're interested in?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Dear Linda,
Good morning and thanks for your urgent response to my letter of assistance.
This money in question $12.5M was deposited by my late husband of blessed
memory who was a wealthy cocoa Farmer and politician before his death.
He left a standing order before the security company that upon provision of
a foreign reliable person which is you,that the security company should not
hesitate to release.
All the relevant documents are with them and kindly use this email to
contact the security handling officer now.
Attn: Dr.Anderson Philips

         Security handling officer
Great Assistance Security Services ( GASS)
Abidjan Cote D'Ivoire.
Email: andersonphilips667@yahoo.com

Please let him know I directed you to him.
Always keep us posted with events.
Madam Janet Ayew

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Dear Madam Janet Ayew,

Good morning! I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your late husband, he must have been a remarkable man. It's interesting to learn that he was a wealthy cocoa farmer and politician.

I appreciate the trust you've placed in me regarding this matter. However, could you please provide more details about the nature of these documents? Also, what is the role of the security handling officer at Great Assistance Security Services (GASS) in Abidjan Cote?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: Fwd: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Hello Madam Janet Ayew,

Good day to you! I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply touched by your situation and would like to extend my sympathies for the loss of your late husband.

I appreciate your trust in me regarding this matter. It's quite a responsibility, and I want to make sure I understand everything correctly. Could you please provide more details about the standing order left by your late husband? What exactly does it entail?

Also, could you tell me more about the security company, Great Assistance Security Services (GASS)? How long have they been handling this case? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please provide some more details?

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
I have given all the detail you need so kindly contact the security company
for further information.
Madam Janet Ayew

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Dear Madam Janet Ayew,

Good morning! I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you've shared with me.

I'm sorry to hear about your late husband. He must have been a remarkable man, being a wealthy cocoa farmer and politician. It's interesting to know that he left such specific instructions regarding the money in question.

Could you please provide more details about the security company, Great Assistance Security Services (GASS)? How long have they been in operation? And could you also share more about the security handling officer I should contact?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Linda,
I am not in position to tell you all these but contact them and ask
whatever questions you deem fit to ask.

subject: Re: From: Mrs.Janet Ayew
body:
Hello Linda,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm not exactly the best person to provide all the details you might need, but I can certainly point you in the right direction. 

You should definitely reach out to them directly and ask any questions that come to your mind. They would be more than happy to assist you with your queries.

Just remember, it's always good to ask as many questions as possible to get a clear understanding of things. Is there anything else you'd like me to help with?

Best wishes,
Linda
